snippet: The two industries also want three more years to retrofit tank cars manufactured since 2011.
abstract: American Petroleum Institute president Jack N Gerard says that oil and railroad industries are urging federal regulators to allow them up to seven years to retrofit tank cars used to transport highly volatile crude oil.
lead_paragraph: The two industries also want three more years to retrofit tank cars manufactured since 2011.

headline.main: Oil and Railroad Industries Seek 7 Years for Retrofitting
headline.print_headline: Oil and Railroad Industries Seek 7 Years for Retrofitting
